main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in New Orleans, Louisiana on April 1, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed to be round in shape, silver in color, and approximately 20-25 feet in diameter., The object hovered at an altitude of about 1000 feet for approximately 5 minutes., The observer is a highly trained aircraft observer, indicating reliability., The weather conditions at the time were clear with good visibility., The object accelerated at a high rate of speed and disappeared in a northerly direction.
sighted object: a round, silver unidentified flying object
